item.title: 1 Month at Murty Lab
item.description:
Welcome to my first post on Arya Bhanushali’s blog! ğŸ‰

Face Selective Neuron Experiment:

In this experiment, our goal was to test whether the â€œfaceâ€‘selectiveâ€ neurons that appear in TopoNet models (ResNetâ€‘18) are both necessary and sufficient to identify faces. We used the CelebA dataset as our face stimulus.

1.Activation

We â€œhookedâ€ into the TopoNetâ€™s last convolutional layer (layer4) so that every time an image passed through the network, we captured the raw activation values of all channels at that layer.
